comment.language: During the Feast of Baptism of our Lord until Tobe 12:
Selama Perayaan Teofani sampai bulan Toubah hari 12

text.language: V/e~taf[iwmc qen Piiordan/c: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who was baptized in the Jordan. Save us and have mercy on us.
Engkau yang telah baptis di Yordan. Selamatkanlah dan kasihanilah kami.
الذي اعتمد في الأردن. خَلِّصْنا وارحَمْنا.
